attributes.action: prohibite any hate speach against great Britain and our own people
attributes.additional_details:
British people are becoming 2nd class citizens in our own country.
We need to get tough. We agree that any support of terrorism is acted upon, however tv programmes such as the jihadis next door, have  shown us that the culprits  are getting away with their crimes.
We need to punish anyone who uses any speach against this country and our own people.  If immigrants wish to live in Great Britain then they must have more respect for our country and our heritage.
attributes.background:
immigrants that choose to live in the United Kingdom are welcomed. However if they choose to remain living here then they must respect our country and everything it stands for.
All to often we are seeing British People verbally abused on the streets of their own country

rejection.details: The law already prohibits expressions of hatred toward someone because of their  nationality (including citizenship), or because of their ethnic or national origin. We are not therefore sure how you would like the law to be changed.
